info.title: Autobag® 500™ REST API Documentation
info.descrption: Control and interface with the Autobag® 500™.

get.description: Retrieves a collection of notifications
get.summary: Retrieves a collection of notifications

parameters.description: The notification's severity (critical, warning, error, or info)

200.description: Successfully logged in as the specified user

parameters.description: User name of the user whose token you wish to refresh

get.summary: Retrieves a collection of users

500.description: Could not find user data

post.description:
Updates a user

500.description: Could not update user data

get.summary: Returns a specific user

parameters.name: userName
parameters.description: User name of the requested user

500.description: Could not find user data

get.summary: Retrieves the current network configuration
get.description:
Retrieves an object describing the current network configuration (IP address mode, IP address, subnet mask, and gateway).

__Permissions:__ This endpoint requires the 'configurationIPConfig' permission. In order to possess this permission, you must log in as a legitimate user first. See the '/login' endpoint to acquire an access token.

200.description: An object describing the current network configuration

500.description: Could not retrieve network configuration data

post.description:
Updates the current network configuration (IP address mode, IP address, subnet mask, and gateway).

__Permissions:__ This endpoint requires the 'configurationIPConfig' permission. In order to possess this permission, you must log in as a legitimate user first. See the '/login' endpoint to acquire an access token.

parameters.name: networkConfiguration
parameters.description: An object describing the current network configuration

200.description: An object describing the current network configuration

500.description: Could not retrieve network configuration data

post.description:
Sends a reset command to the main Autobag® 500™ control board.


__Permissions:__ This endpoint requires the 'diagnosticsForceOutputs' permission. In order to possess this permission, you must log in as a legitimate user first. See the '/login' endpoint to acquire an access token.

200.description: Successfully reset the bagger

500.description: Could not reset the bagger

get.summary: Gets the current status of the bagger
get.description: Retrieves the current status of the Autobag® 500™ bagger.

200.description: The current status of the bagger

500.description: Could not retrieve the status of the bagger

get.summary: Gets the specified sub-property of the current status of the bagger
get.description:
Retrieves the specified sub-property of the current status of the Autobag® 500™ bagger.
Possible properties are:
- uptime: integer
- autoCycleActive: boolean
- infeedWait: boolean
- autoSingleMode: integer
- countEyeAccessory: boolean
- airBlower: boolean
- countEyeJob: boolean
- palmSwitchMode: integer
- lotCount: integer
- countEyeMode: integer
- currentJob: string
- lotRemaining: integer
- totalCount: integer
- palmSwitch: boolean
- bagsPerMinute: number
- lotSize: integer
- fabConnected: boolean
- countEyeDetected: integer
- countEyeTarget: integer

parameters.name: property
parameters.description: Name of the sub-property to retrieve

200.description: The specified sub-property of the current status of the bagger

500.description: Could not retrieve the specified sub-property of the current status of the bagger

get.summary: Retrieves a collection of jobs
get.description: Retrieves an array of all the available jobs on the Autobag® 500™ which match the given query parameters.

parameters.name: readonly
parameters.description: Whether or not the job is readonly

200.description: An array of all the available jobs on the Autobag® 500™

500.description: Could not retrieve the available jobs

get.summary: Gets the current job
get.description: Retrieves an object describing the settings of the currently loaded job.

200.description: An object describing the settings of the currently loaded job

500.description: Could not retrieve the settings of the currently loaded job

post.description:
Updates the settings of the currently loaded job.


__Permissions:__ This endpoint requires the 'jobSettingsModify' permission. In order to possess this permission, you must log in as a legitimate user first. See the '/login' endpoint to acquire an access token.

parameters.name: currentJobSettings
parameters.description: An object describing the new settings for the currently loaded job

200.description: An object describing the settings of the currently loaded job

500.description: Could not update the settings of the currently loaded job

get.summary: Gets the current job saved status
get.description: Gets the current job saved status.

200.description: A value representing whether or not the current job has been saved

500.description: Could not get whether or not the current job has been saved

get.summary: Gets the current machine info
get.description:
Gets information about the current configuration of the Autobag® 500™ including:
* Firmware version info
* Serial number
* Network hostname

200.description: A value representing the current machine info

500.description: Could not get the current machine info

get.summary: Gets min, max, and default values for all job parameters
get.description: Retrieves an object describing the min, max, and default values for each job parameter.

200.description: An object describing the min, max, and default values for each job parameter

500.description: Could not retrieve the job parameters

get.summary: Gets a specific job
get.description:
Retrieves an object describing the settings of the specified job.


__Permissions:__ This endpoint requires the 'jobSettingsView' or 'integration' permission. In order to possess this permission, you must log in as a legitimate user first. See the '/login' endpoint to acquire an access token.

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: Name of the job to retrieve settings for

200.description: An object describing the new settings for the specified job

401.description: Access denied - Permission jobSettingsView required or Access denied - Permission integration required

500.description: Could not retrieve the settings of the specified job

post.description:
Updates the settings of the specified job. Note that this function will also load the specified job as the current job.


__Permissions:__ This endpoint requires the 'jobsSave' or 'integration' permission. In order to possess this permission, you must log in as a legitimate user first. See the '/login' endpoint to acquire an access token.

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: Name of the job to update

parameters.name: job
parameters.description: An object describing the new settings for the specified job

200.description: An object describing the new settings for the specified job

401.description: Access denied - Permission jobsSave required or Access denied - Permission integration required

500.description: Could not update the settings of the specified job

put.description:
Creates a new job based on the settings provided. Note that this function will also load the new job as the current job.


__Permissions:__ This endpoint requires the 'jobsSave' or 'integration' permission. In order to possess this permission, you must log in as a legitimate user first. See the '/login' endpoint to acquire an access token.

parameters.name: job
parameters.description: An object describing the new settings for the specified job

200.description: An object describing the new settings for the specified job

401.description: Access denied - Permission jobsSave required or Access denied - Permission integration required

500.description: Could not create the new job

parameters.description: Name of the job to remove

200.description: Successfully removed the specified job

401.description: Access denied - Permission jobsDelete required or Access denied - Permission integration required

500.description: Could not remove the specified job

post.description:
Loads the specified job as the current job.


__Permissions:__ This endpoint requires the 'jobsLoad' or 'integration' permission. In order to possess this permission, you must log in as a legitimate user first. See the '/login' endpoint to acquire an access token.

parameters.name: jobName
parameters.description: Name of the job to load

200.description: Successfully loaded the specified job

401.description: Access denied - Permission jobsLoad required or Access denied - Permission integration required

500.description: Could not load the specified job

post.description:
Resets the Strip Rip™ count to 0.


__Permissions:__ This endpoint requires the 'jobsSave' or 'integration' permission. In order to possess this permission, you must log in as a legitimate user first. See the '/login' endpoint to acquire an access token.

200.description: Successfully reset the Strip Rip™ count

401.description: Access denied - Permission jobsSave required or Access denied - Permission integration required

500.description: Could not reset the Strip Rip™ count

put.description:
Resets the perforation status (Consecutive Missed, Total Missed, and Total Detected). The value that is reset is controlled by passing one of two values for the resetOption parameter\:
- totalPrefDetected: Reset the Total Missed Perforation Count
- totalPrefMissed: Reset the Total Detected Perforation Count

__Permissions:__ This endpoint requires the 'diagnosticsStatus' permission. In order to possess this permission, you must log in as a legitimate user first. See the '/login' endpoint to acquire an access token.

200.description: Successfully reset the perforation status

500.description: Could not reset the perforation status

post.description:
Adjusts the Count Eye count (increment, decrement, or reset). The type of adjustment made is controlled by passing one of three values for the mode parameter\:
- incrementCountEyeCount: Increment the Count Eye Count
- decrementCountEyeCount: Decrement the Count Eye Count
- resetCountEyeCount: Reset the Count Eye Count

__Permissions:__ This endpoint requires the 'dashboardResetTotalCount' or 'integration' permission. In order to possess this permission, you must log in as a legitimate user first. See the '/login' endpoint to acquire an access token.

200.description: Successfully adjusted the Count Eye count

401.description: Access denied - Permission dashboardResetTotalCount required or Access denied - Permission integration required

500.description: Could not adjust the Count Eye count

post.description:
Opens the gripper.

__Permissions:__ This endpoint requires the 'dashboardActions' or 'integration' permission. In order to possess this permission, you must log in as a legitimate user first. See the '/login' endpoint to acquire an access token.

__Acccess:__ This endpoint requires local access to the bagger.

200.description: Successfully opened the gripper

401.description: "Access denied - Permission dashboardActions required" or "Access denied - Permission integration required" or "Access denied - Local access required"

500.description: Could not open the gripper

post.description:
Runs the conveyor.

__Permissions:__ This endpoint requires the 'dashboardActions' or 'integration' permission. In order to possess this permission, you must log in as a legitimate user first. See the '/login' endpoint to acquire an access token.

__Acccess:__ This endpoint requires local access to the bagger.

200.description: Successfully ran the conveyor

401.description: "Access denied - Permission dashboardActions required" or "Access denied - Permission integration required" or "Access denied - Local access required"

500.description: Could not run the conveyor

post.summary: Signals the bag opener to ungrip the bag (extend the bag opener)
post.description:
Signals the bag opener to ungrip the bag (extend the bag opener).

post.description:
Switches the bagger between Auto mode and Single mode.

- 0: Single Mode
- 1: Auto Momde

__Permissions:__ This endpoint requires the 'dashboardChangeMode' or 'integration' permission. In order to possess this permission, you must log in as a legitimate user first. See the '/login' endpoint to acquire an access token.

__Acccess:__ This endpoint requires local access to the bagger.

parameters.name: switchModeValue
parameters.description: Operation mode; 0 is Single Mode and 1 is Auto Mode

200.description: Successfully switched the current operation mode

401.description: "Access denied - Permission dashboardChangeMode required" or "Access denied - Permission integration required" or "Access denied - Local access required"

500.description: Could not switch the current operation mode

post.description:
Exits Auto mode.

__Acccess:__ This endpoint requires local access to the bagger.

200.description: Successfully exited Auto mode

parameters.name: lifetimeCount

parameters.name: userCount

parameters.description: The job name at the time of the log entry

parameters.name: controlState
parameters.description: The state of the main control board at the time of the log entry

parameters.name: time
parameters.description: The time when the log entry occurred

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: The date when the log entry occurred

put.summary: Updates the state of a Force-able Output
put.description:
Updates the state of a Force-able Output. This method requires passing a pair of values: the name of the Force-able Output to change (*optionname*) and the desired new state (*statusvalue*).</br></br>

Available values for *optionname* and *statusvalue*:

* airBlowerOption
  - On
  - Off
  - Release
* airPulseOption
  - On
  - Off
  - Release
* bagKickerOption
  - Engage
  - Disengage
  - Exhaust
  - Release
* bagOpenerOption
  - Retract
  - Extend
  - Exhaust
  - Release
* sealBarOption
  - Close
  - Open
  - Exhaust
  - Release
* accumulatingFunnelOption
  - Close
  - Open
  - Exhaust
  - Release
* heatBarOption
  - Engage
  - Disengage
  - Release
* sealFlattenerOption
  - Up
  - Down
  - Release
* sealBarGripOption
  - Engage
  - Disengage
  - Exhaust
  - Release
* supportShelfOption
  - Drop
  - Raise
  - Exhaust
  - Release
* supportShelfAirGuideOption
  - On
  - Off
  - Release
* trimSealBlowerOption
  - On
  - Off
  - Release


__Permissions:__ This endpoint requires the 'diagnosticsForceOutputs' permission. In order to possess this permission, you must log in as a legitimate user first. See the '/login' endpoint to acquire an access token.

parameters.name: forceableOutputValue
parameters.description: Name and new state of the Force-able Output to update

200.description: Successfully updated the state of the Force-able Output

500.description: Could not update the state of the Force-able Output

endShakeCount.description: The end of cycle shake count in seconds

countEyeJob.description: Turns the count eye ON or OFF

sealFlattener.description: Turns the seal flattener ON or OFF

shakeTrigger.description:
The input for the shake trigger

__Possible values:__
| Value | Description    |
| ----- | -------------- |
| 0     | End of Cycle   |
| 1     | Count Eye      |
| 2     | External Input |

perforationDetectionUpperWindow.description: The upper window for perforation detection

countDelayBeforeCycle.description: The count eye delay before cycle in seconds from 0-3. This is the amount of time between the last item counted and the machine cycling.

countEyeMode.description:
The type of count eye installed

__Possible values:__
| Value | Description  |
| ----- | ------------ |
| 0     | SimpleCount™ |
| 1     | SmartCount™  |

sealPoint.description:
From 0.25 to 5 inches (0.635 to 12.7cm). This controls the point at which the bag is sealed relative to the opening of the bag +/- 0.0625 inches (+/-1.59mm). A recommended seal point is 1 inch (2.54cm). 

__NOTE:__ On Autobag 550 machines (with the printer), changing the seal point affects the print cycle. If the seal point is changed, the repeat distance may need to be changed to a larger value if the repeat distance is set close to the bags limit.

sealFlattenerPinTargetVelocity.description: The target velocity for the seal flattener pin

multibatchCount.description:
Set the Batch Count to the needed number.

__NOTE:__ Multi batch is only available when the machine is tied to an infeed system and signaling is turned ON.

sealTime.description:
From 0 to 3 seconds. This controls how long the seal bar remains closed while sealing.

__NOTE:__ A setting of 0 seal time does not prevent the seal bar from moving during a bag cycle.

The seal bar will remain closed longer than the set seal time during the first seal. This is due to the heat wire having to come up to temperature after being at idle. After the first cycle, the seal bar will remain closed at the set seal time.

batchTime.description: The amount of time in seconds to complete a batch during funnel operation

shakeTimeDown.description: The shake time down in seconds

airPulseDelay.description: The  air pulse delay in seconds

shake.description: Turns the shake ON or OFF

airPulse.description: Turns the air pulse ON or OFF

printLocation.description: From 1.5 to 36.25 inches (3.81cm to 92.08cm). This controls the location of the printed label on the bag relative to the print mark or perforation. Print location will vary depending on the size of the label and bag being used.

bagTension.description: How much tension is placed on the bags

supportShelf.description: Turns the support shelf ON or OFF

sealBarGripDisengageTime.description: The seal bar grip disengage time

blowerOffDelay.description: The delay time in seconds for turning off the blower during funnel operation once the door has entered the bag

missedPerforationCount.description: The total number of missed perforations

stripRipCount.description: The number of bags to be strip ripped per cycle

blowerDuration.description:
The duration the trim seal blower will blow after the blower delay.

__NOTE:__ Optimal setting for the blower duration is 0.2 seconds.

airBlower.description: Turns the air blower ON or OFF

sealFlattenerPinRampUpTime.description: The seal flattener pin ramp up time

perfDetWindow.description: Turns the perforation detection window ON or OFF

sureFill.description: Turns sure fill ON or OFF

readonly.description: Denotes if the job is marked as readonly

airGuide.description: Turns the Air Guide ON or OFF

printCycle.description: Turns print cycle ON or OFF

clampBeforeReverse.description: Turns clamp before reverse ON or OFF

bagKicker.description: Turns the bag kicker ON or OFF

sealFlattenerPinInDelayTime.description: The seal flattener pin in delay time

sealTemperature.description:
From 200 to 450°F (143.3-232.2°C). Seal temperature can be adjusted for environmental conditions or bag materials.

__NOTE:__ A seal temperature setting between 360-390°F (182.2-198.9°C) is recommended.

printDarkness.description: From 0-30. Controls the darkness of the printed label with 0 being the lightest and 30 being the darkest. The optimal range is between 16-22.

airPulseDuration.description:
From 0 to 3 seconds. This controls the amount of time the air pulse remains on after indexing a new bag.

__NOTE:__ If the air pulse value is set too high, the bag will flutter open and closed interfering with product loading.

accumulatingFunnelMode.description:
The default position for the funnel door during funnel operation

__Possible values:__
| Value | Description |
| ----- | ----------- |
| 0     | Open        |
| 1     | Closed      |

conveyor.description: Turns the conveyor ON or OFF

supportShelfMode.description:
The default default position off the support shelf in the OFF position

__Possible values:__
| Value | Description |
| ----- | ----------- |
| 0     | Raised      |
| 1     | Dropped     |

sealBar.description: Turns the seal bar ON or OFF

loadTime.description: From 0 to 100 seconds. This controls the amount of time the seal bar stays in the home position between bagging cycles to allow for product loading.

sealBarGripEngageTime.description: The seal bar grip engage time

perforationDetectionLowerWindow.description: The lower window for perforation detection

stripRip.description: Turns strip rip ON or OFF

printSpeed.description: From 2 to 12 inches/seconds (5.08 to 30.48 cm/sec). Controls the speed that the bag is indexed when a label is being printed on the bag. A PRINT SPEED of 6 inches/second (15.24 cm/sec) is recommended.

bagOpenDelay.description: Turns bag open delay in seconds

bagKickTime.description: The time for the bag kicker

blowerDelay.description:
The delay in seconds for the trim seal blower.

__NOTE:__ Optimal setting for the blower delay is 0.2 seconds.

accumulatingFunnel.description: Turns the accumulating funnel ON or OFF

timeDelayBeforeOpen.description: The  time delay in seconds of the funnel door prior to opening during funnel operation

startShakeCount.description: The start shake count in seconds

countEyeTarget.description: The target number of items for the count eye during bagging

multibatch.description: Turns Multi Batch ON or OFF

idleTemperature.description: The temperature the heat wire will default to when the bagger is in idle mode

advanceDelay.description: From 0-3 seconds. This controls the delay of the next bag advancing after the machine tears off a bag.

sealFlattenerPinStartVelocity.description: The seal flattener pin start velocity

sealFlattenerMode.description:
The seal flattener off position

__Possible values:__
| Value | Description |
| ----- | ----------- |
| 0     | Up          |
| 1     | Down        |

airPulseRetryCount.description: The number of retries for the air pulse

sealFlattenerPinRampDownTime.description: The seal flattener pin ramp down time

repeatDistance.description:
From 2 to 108 inches (5.08 to 274.32cm). This controls the distance the machine will feed out a bag if a perforation is missed. The repeat distance may be measured on the material web from perforation to perforation. Repeat distance must be set equal to or greater than the current bag length.

__NOTE:__ Repeat distance for an Autobag 550 machine should not be set to less than 5.5in (14cm) as this will cause the main nip to stall and ruin the next bag.

sealFlattenerPinOutDelayTime.description: The seal flattener pin out delay time

airBlowerDuration.description: The duration the air blower will blow

bagGripper.description: Turns the bag gripper ON or OFF

trimSeal.description: Turns Trim Seal ON or OFF

shakeTimeUp.description: The shake time up in seconds

enableCountEyeCountAdjustment.description: Turns Count Eye Count Adjustment ON or OFF

enableCountEyeCountReset.description: Turns Count Eye Count Reset ON or OFF

bagOpener.description: Turnsthe Bag Opener ON or OFF

bagOpenerVerify.description: Turns the Bag Opener Verify setting ON or OFF

bagOpenerDelayBeforeRetract.description: The delay before the bag opener retracts

bagOpenerAirBlowerDuration.description: How long the air blower runs while trying to open a bag

bagOpenerRetryCount.description: The number of times the bag opener tries to open a bag after a failure

bagOpenerRetryCountReachedAction.description:
The action the bag opener takes after it fails to open a bag and all of the retries are exhausted

__Possible values:__
| Value | Description |
| ----- | ----------- |
| 0     | Error       |
| 1     | Reject      |
